This is a scraping suggestion for the following website: 
https://globalcareers-goldmansachs.icims.com/jobs/search?pr=4&searchRelation=keyword_all&in_iframe=1&mobile=false&width=570&height=500&bga=true&needsRedirect=false&jan1offset=60&jun1offset=120
The required content was found in the source code. Therefore, rvest was chosen over RSelenium due to performance reasons.

```{r}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
library(rvest)
library(DT)
url <- "https://globalcareers-goldmansachs.icims.com/jobs/search?pr=4&searchRelation=keyword_all&in_iframe=1&mobile=false&width=570&height=500&bga=true&needsRedirect=false&jan1offset=60&jun1offset=120"
xpath <- data.frame("
	/html/body/div/ul/li/div[3]/a/span[2]
")
data <- read_html(x = url) %>% html_nodes(xpath = as.character(xpath)) %>% html_text()
dt <- datatable(
	data = data.frame(data),
	options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
dt
```
